gra odchodzi od typowych klikatuch cs'a, ponieważ posiada tryb fabularny/dla jendego gracza.
dla ludzi którzy wlą bardziej klasyczną rozgrywke, jest multiplayer, kory nie róźni się niczym od multika z csa 1.6

 kampania według mnie jest ciekawie zrobiona, choć przeciwnicy zabijają odrazu wchodząc do pomieszczenia, a gracz nie może nic zrobić. w tej grze też są boss'owie (chyba jest ich 4) tak jak 2 pokonałem ich z łatowścią, to pozotała dwójka sprawiła trudność.

jedyny bład jaki napotkałem to taki, że po wczytaniu gry zawsze gra myślała, że trzymam LPM i bronie strzelały full auto i kliknięcie przycisku strzału naprawiło sytuacje. (ile ja natraciłem amunicji przez to)

Это CS 1.6 с миссиями.

[h1] 10,000+ hours and counting. [/h1] 

[b] Pros: [/b]
[list]
[*] Modest on system requirements. 
[*] Consistent game play. 
[*] There's not too much visual overload for those prone to distractions. 
[*] Rounds aren't overly long whether you like to hold back and guard your objective or you like to rush your objective and possibly only last a minute. 
[/list]

[u] Parental guidance for online play. [/u]

There's lots of potential to take a mental break and have a laugh with your friends.   
The CZ community has a wide gradient of skilled players.

[b] Tips: [/b]

Your team mates are going to block you and/or team flash you at times. 
[i] Work on not letting that happen. [/i]

At times it will feel like other team mates are the cause of your demise. 
[i] Authentically taking responsibility for your level of effectiveness appears to be key to continually enhansing your game.  It appears to help with players overall happiness as well.  Counter-Intuitive. [/i]

For me,Counter Strike's a childhood memory.I can still remember the day when I played CS1.6 on my old laptop for the fist time.
Because CSCZ was among several games which could be played on a laptop with a mere integrated graphics card(unfortunately CSS was not),it did have brought me a lot of fun during that hard period.

Bom não tem o que dizer muito desse game. Eu comprei mais por causa do Deleted Scenes que vem junto e é tipo um modo campanha de CS. Sim! Modo ''campanha'' de CS. Não é exatamente um modo história e sim sequencias de missões com introduções do objetivo lembrando bastante os games de Call of Duty Modern Warfare.
É tipo um caça terrorista com cada missão sendo única se passando em vários lugares do mundo.
Tem uns equipamentos que eu nunca tinha visto no CS antes como por exemplo uma câmera que enxerga por buracos de porta, rádio comunicador e uma espécie de maçarico portátil. Eu gosto bastante desse Deleted Scenes por sair do padrão que CS tem.
Esse jogo fez parte de minha vida gamer a muito tempo atrás e fiz questão de compra-lo original pra jogar novamente.
É bem legal e recomendo sim, principalmente se vc joga o CS convencional.
NOTA: 6/10

[h1][u]Condition Zero[/u][/h1]
Второе единственное годное (первое ниже), что происходило с серией counter-strike. В сумме: улучшенная версия “CS 1.6” + удачная попытка предоставить интересную игру с ботами (благодаря челленджам и пользовательским наборам оных). 

[h1][u]Deleted Scenes[/u][/h1] [i](26.01.2018)[/i]
Симулятор спецназа бифо рэйнбоу сикс. Разработана на основе оригинального Counter Strike студией [url=https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ritual_Entertainment]Ritual Entertainment[/url]. Изначально версия Deleted Scenes должна была быть основной в релизе Condition Zero, но по итогу была отодвинута на второй план. 
Классический геймплей Counter Strike в адаптации под сюжетные миссии в Deleted Scenes выдал для меня кое что более интересное, чем все, что может преподнести простой оригинал. Игра дает возможность влиться в шкуру спецназовца (будь то американский [url=https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/SEAL]seal[/url]овик, [url=http://ru.warriors.wikia.com/wiki/Группа_специального_назначения_Японии]японский[/url] или русский спецназовец, член немецкого [url=https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/GSG_9]CSG 9[/url] или британского [url=https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Особая_воздушная_служба]SAS[/url]) и по-настоящему вдарить по террористам, где бы они не находились и какими-бы разнообразными не были их замыслы. Ценю игру за возможность побывать в “исторических” местах и ситуациях борьбы с терроризмом, за возможность погрузиться в роль, а не просто “зайти понагибать гы”.
Относительно, игра явилась меланхоличным откровением для меня, показала ценность, сложность и опасность труда спецслужб. 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1201224303[i]Музыка к скриншоту (00:00-00:25):[/i] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M1vwnr_u6fc

The tactical squad-based shooter franchise Counter-Strike has had a long and storied history from humble beginnings as a GoldSrc deathmatching mod, to years of loyal followers as a title officially picked-up and supported by Valve, to the massive gaming icon and economic powerhouse that the most recent instalment - Global Offensive, has become. While having been surpassed technologically by more recent instalments, in this lowly reviewer’s opinion, Condition Zero remains the best in the series.

Controls and gameplay ought to seem familiar to most-anyone who has played a Valve title or have looked at a first-person PC game in this last two decades; all very basic and easy to learn - WASD to move, mouse to look, and a handful of other simple buttons to do things like bring up the score table and such. These simple controls and gameplay mechanics belie the massive upper skill ceiling which has kept Condition Zero veterans enthralled with the game for more than a decade. 

Gameplay objectives remain much the same as they were in CS1.6, pitting two teams of fully armed terrorists and counter-terrorists against each other across a number of tense bomb-disposal and hostage rescue situations in a test of strategic communication, flick reflexes, and tactical fund management. Where Condition Zero unquestionably excels over its peers is in all aspects of the singleplayer experience. CZ brings in full native AI bot support, and these cutting-edge-fourteen-years-ago opponents remain respectfully challenging in both organisational intelligence and in moment-to-moment gunplay. Furthermore, Condition Zero provides a new ‘Tour of Duty’ campaign wherein the player advances through eighty-four scenarios designed to test their mettle across every map and type of weapon. 

Despite a not-uncomplicated development cycle and sales figures actually along Valve’s lowest at release, the recognisable excellence of Condition Zero has ensured a healthy fanbase and playercount more than a decade later, and given the inexpense of this game, either bundled alongside the original 1.6 release and an admittedly poorer expansion-sequel, or as part of the Valve Complete Pack, this is definitely something to look out for during any one of Steam’s frequent sales.

Very thoroughly recommended.

挺有挑战性的，任务就是一打一堆，对战则是打群架。玩了半天，人质卡管道，人质不走，对面一个狙击杀你一群之类的非常常见。而电脑没了玩家指挥作用很差，除了反应时间和枪法还在。常常看到还没搜查附近有无敌人就去救人质，拆c4的电脑。电脑不会捡拆弹包，就有拆弹包离自己两步远，不捡起来拆弹而是徒手拆导致一局失败的结果。而即使你离c4有半个地图的距离，电脑还是“掩护”你拆弹，然后他们被炸死....总之，bot难度看上去也就是枪法反应的改动。而电脑拿AWP简直没法玩，就是让你连还手的机会都没有。对抗电脑首选防爆盾和烟雾弹，防爆盾可以让你在敌人眼皮底下拆C4，救人质，有效防备在救援区蹲你的拿大狙的恐怖分子。进攻能力差。而烟雾弹则是让你蹲烟雾里杀人。只要在烟雾里你看不见队友敌人名字的地方，电脑不碰到你就不会开枪。闪光弹对电脑效果极差
